A '''fisherman''' is a [[villager]] who [[sell]]s fishing items and campfires. Fishermen wear fisher hats and have a blue [[fish]] as well as a net on their trousers secured with a strap.

== Spawning ==
An unemployed [[villager]] turns into an fisherman when an unclaimed [[barrel]] is nearby.

=== Natural generation ===
{{Main|Villager#Spawning}}
The workstation of fishermans, the [[barrel]], generates in fisherman houses in [[village]]s.

== Drops ==
{{Main|Hero of the Village#Gifts}}
{{IN|java}}, a fisherman can drop various items by throwing them as a gift towards a nearby player with the [[Hero of the Village]] effect. The gift is randomly selected from the following list:
*{{ItemLink|Raw Cod}}
*{{ItemLink|Raw Salmon}}
